text:
Hi, I am Claire Gribbin,
Worldwide Head of the SMB Customer
Segment at AWS.

Small businesses are beautifully
creative, and the main economic
engine of the world.

As small business owners,
you are my passion!

I'm super lucky to be able to
focus 100% of my time to advocate

for you inside of Amazon Web
Services, the part of Amazon
that provides cloud services.

I am presenting a series of short
videos to help you understand

how the Cloud can impact your
business, and also why you should
consider acting soon.

In today's fast-paced
business landscape, the survival

and success of small businesses
hinge on their ability to navigate

a delicate balancing act across
3 key goals: accelerating

speed to market, building
customer trust, and managing

to reduce costs at the same
time.
The first goal is speed to market.

It depends on the rapid introduction,
or evolution, of products
or services.

In an era where customer
preferences change swiftly,

being the first to offer a new
solution can give your business
a competitive edge.

It helps you capture the attention
of early adopters and capitalize

on emerging trends to help ensure
your business remains relevant
and attractive.

The second goal is customer
trust.

Swift market entry is valuable,
but without trust, customers

may hesitate to engage with
your brand.

Here is how you foster trust:
deliver high quality and secure

products and services,
protect customer data privacy,

and provide reliable customer
support.

To do this, it's necessary
to be transparent and listen

to your customers, act on what
you hear by addressing

their concerns promptly,
and deliver on promises.

The third goal, which directly
impacts small businesses'

ability to survive and thrive,
is reducing costs.

Efficient processes, resource
allocation, and supply chain

management contribute
to streamlined operations.

Furthermore, cost reduction
provides financial resilience,

helping you to weather economic
uncertainties and invest in growth
opportunities.

In essence, the interplay
of these three goals together

- speed to market, trust-building,
and cost reduction - forms
the core of a growth strategy.

These elements complement
each other, creating a cycle
of success.

In the next 3 videos, I'll talk
about how to accomplish

all three of these goals without
sacrificing any of them.
